meanings.sent1: The unexpended energy in the battery powered the flashlight for hours.
meanings.sent2: She carefully saved her unexpended allowance to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The unexpended snacks in the pantry tempted the hungry children.
meanings.sent4: His unexpended enthusiasm for the project was evident in his dedication.
meanings.sent5: The unexpended paint on the palette dried up over time.

meanings.sent1: The unexpended funds in the budget were allocated for future projects.
meanings.sent2: There was unexpended time left in the day for a quick nap.
meanings.sent3: The unexpended vacation days piled up as he never took time off.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpended creativity sparked a new idea for the team.
meanings.sent5: The unexpended seats at the concert were quickly filled by eager fans.
